author: The Spiffing Brit
description:
Donate Here: https://tilt.fyi/mqEgxoujDj

Spiff Vs Chari-Tea: https://tilt.fyi/DRaFcPxChe

STREAM RULES: 
Welcome This is the Skyrim 100 Days charity livestream. The rules are simple attempt to survive 100 Days in a maximum difficulty hardcore survival mode world of skyrim that is currently dealing with an ongoing zombie apocalypse. You are effectively playing at 1 hp and almost anything will kill you and fail the run. Ontop of that in survival mode you must eat and sleep similarly to an indie survival game. You must also balance temperatures which in the cold northern lands of skyrim is rather impossible. 

Donating £35 ($45) Supports the Grand Appeal in their efforts to make the outstanding Bristol children's hospital even better. At the same time you also get these incredible games:
Tactical Breach Wizards.
Mouthwashing.
Core Keeper.
Warhammer Chaos Gate Daemonhunters.
Tower Unite.
Old World.
Ixion.
Spiritfall.
Gatekeeper.
Wild Bastards.
Rogue Waters.
Rusty's Retirement
Train Sim W
title: Can I Survive 100 Days in Zombie Survival Mode? - Perfectly Balanced Skyrim Challenge #live
